20 Feb 2019

“Aim high, to be sure, but do it for the love of the work. The work and the love – that’s going to be there in the end in any case. The only real grade is this: how well you’ve lived your life.” – Excellent Sheep By William Deresiewicz

“Everything undertaken for its own sake is worthwhile, irrespective of the outcome.” – Geoff Dyer
